import { DarkModeToggle, IconLib, Label, Stack, Toggle, View, useCheck } from '@fold-dev/core'
import React from 'react'

export const docs = {
    title: 'Toggle',
    subtitle: 'The Toggle component swiftly transitions between two potential states (on/off).',
    description:
        'The Toggle component allows users to switch something between an on and off state, much like a light switch. Unlike a Checkbox, which is used for making selections, a Toggle is used to activate or deactivate a feature or function.',
}

```tsx
import { Toggle, DarkModeToggle } from "@fold-dev/core";
```

### Usage

export const Usage = () => {
    const { checked, check } = useCheck(false);
    return (<Toggle onChange={check} on={checked}/>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Usage />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="BasicUsage.tsx" code="ZXhwb3J0IGNvbnN0IFVzYWdlID0gKCkgPT4gewogICAgY29uc3QgeyBjaGVja2VkLCBjaGVjayB9ID0gdXNlQ2hlY2soZmFsc2UpCiAgICByZXR1cm4gKAogICAgICAgIDxUb2dnbGUKICAgICAgICAgICAgb25DaGFuZ2U9e2NoZWNrfQogICAgICAgICAgICBvbj17Y2hlY2tlZH0KICAgICAgICAvPgogICAgKQp9" />

```tsx
export const Usage = () => {
    const { checked, check } = useCheck(false)
    return (
        <Toggle
            onChange={check}
            on={checked}
        />
    )
}
```
### Sizes

export const Sizes = () => {
    const { checked, check } = useCheck(false);
    return (<Stack spacing={10} direction="vertical">
            <Toggle onChange={check} on={checked} size="xs"/>
            <Toggle onChange={check} on={checked} size="sm"/>
            <Toggle onChange={check} on={checked} size="md"/>
            <Toggle onChange={check} on={checked} size="lg"/>
            <Toggle onChange={check} on={checked} size="xl"/>
        </Stack>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<Sizes />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="Sizes.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const Sizes = () => {
    const { checked, check } = useCheck(false)

    return (
        <Stack
            spacing={10}
            direction="vertical">
            <Toggle
                onChange={check}
                on={checked}
                size="xs"
            />
            <Toggle
                onChange={check}
                on={checked}
                size="sm"
            />
            <Toggle
                onChange={check}
                on={checked}
                size="md"
            />
            <Toggle
                onChange={check}
                on={checked}
                size="lg"
            />
            <Toggle
                onChange={check}
                on={checked}
                size="xl"
            />
        </Stack>
    )
}
```
### Prefix And Suffix

export const PrefixAndSuffix = () => {
    const { checked, check } = useCheck(false);
    return (<Stack spacing={10} direction="vertical">
            <Toggle onChange={check} on={checked} prefix={<IconLib icon="sun"/>}/>
            <Toggle onChange={check} on={checked} suffix={<IconLib icon="moon"/>}/>
            <Toggle onChange={check} on={checked} prefix={<IconLib icon="sun"/>} suffix={<IconLib icon="moon"/>}/>
        </Stack>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<PrefixAndSuffix />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="PrefixAndSuffix.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const PrefixAndSuffix = () => {
    const { checked, check } = useCheck(false)

    return (
        <Stack
            spacing={10}
            direction="vertical">
            <Toggle
                onChange={check}
                on={checked}
                prefix={<IconLib icon="sun" />}
            />
            <Toggle
                onChange={check}
                on={checked}
                suffix={<IconLib icon="moon" />}
            />
            <Toggle
                onChange={check}
                on={checked}
                prefix={<IconLib icon="sun" />}
                suffix={<IconLib icon="moon" />}
            />
        </Stack>
    )
}
```
### With Label

export const WithLabel = () => {
    const { checked, check } = useCheck(false);
    return (<View row gap={10} justifyContent="flex-start">
            <Toggle id="one" onChange={check} on={checked}/>
            <Label htmlFor="one">Message when added to group</Label>
        </View>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<WithLabel />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="WithLabel.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const WithLabel = () => {
    const { checked, check } = useCheck(false)

    return (
        <View
            row
            gap={10}
            justifyContent="flex-start">
            <Toggle
                id="one"
                onChange={check}
                on={checked}
            />
            <Label htmlFor="one">Message when added to group</Label>
        </View>
    )
}
```
### States

export const States = () => {
    const { checked, check } = useCheck(false);
    return (<Stack spacing={10}>
            <Toggle onChange={check} on={checked}/>
            <Toggle onChange={check} on={checked} disabled/>
        </Stack>);
};

<div className="story-block">
<States />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="States.tsx" code="" />

```tsx
export const States = () => {
    const { checked, check } = useCheck(false)

    return (
        <Stack spacing={10}>
            <Toggle
                onChange={check}
                on={checked}
            />
            <Toggle
                onChange={check}
                on={checked}
                disabled
            />
        </Stack>
    )
}
```
### Dark Mode

> Fold includes a dark-mode toggle that automatically toggles between dark & light modes.

export const DarkMode = () => {
    return <DarkModeToggle />;
};

<div className="story-block">
<DarkMode />
</div>

<CodeComponent filename="DarkMode.tsx" code="ZXhwb3J0IGNvbnN0IERhcmtNb2RlID0gKCkgPT4gewogICAgcmV0dXJuIDxEYXJrTW9kZVRvZ2dsZSAvPgp9" />

```tsx
export const DarkMode = () => {
    return <DarkModeToggle />
}
```

export default ({ children }) => <ComponentLayout docs={docs} props={props} css={css}>{children}</ComponentLayout>
